# base

The base abstract model interfaces for LLM models.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="TypedDict" /> TypedDict

A simple typed namespace. At runtime it is equivalent to a plain dict.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="AsyncContextStream" /> AsyncContextStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM with context.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="AsyncContextStructuredStream" /> AsyncContextStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM with context.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="ContextResponse" /> ContextResponse

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="ContextStream" /> ContextStream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM with context.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="ContextStructuredStream" /> ContextStructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM with context.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="Stream" /> Stream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="StructuredStream" /> StructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="ContextToolDef" /> ContextToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="models/base/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Class" path="models/base/index" symbolName="Params" /> Params

The base interface for LLM parameters.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="models/base/index" symbolName="Client" /> Client

The base interface for LLM clients.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="models/base/index" symbolName="LLM" /> LLM

The base interface for LLM models.
